title: Elementalist Lux Artists/Composers
body: Does anyone know who did the art and music for the login screen that's currently on the PBE? I need to know so I can die happy.

replies.body:
Hey Bad Pilot,

I contributed the music to Elementalist Lux. I'll let the graphic artist know that he should come out of the woodwork and bask in the glow of praise!

Also... please don't die :P

Thanks for digging our work!

Heyo, Is there any chance that in the future, you'll release the sheet music for this (Like you did with the Kindred theme)? And if you already have, do you think you'll be able to post a link to it?

Love your work, mate!

I thought the music was beautifully done. Goes to show that the talent that riot picks up are no joke {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} . The music is up there with Diana login / taliyah for me. 

As for the artist for the login screen; would he/she happen to have an artstation or deviant art that I could check out? Would love to see more of his/her work!
